entry.title: Pranav Mistry at TED :The sixth sense
entry.content: Recently I heard about Pranav Mistry from one of my friend Prajith . Though I saw the video I didnot get much time to write about that . I don’t know whether every one may have heard about him too. Let me keep those two awesome videos . IÂ hope you too enjoyed it . And I am very happy to hear and tell you that he puts all as opensource . Does any one do like that ? I am not keeping all the links to his projects . Check Pranav mistry’s website for more information . Lots there guys .
